description: This file implements the methods of the RialtoConnector class, which manages sessions and states for a Rialto server connection within the WPEFramework namespace. It includes methods for initializing the connector, creating and managing application sessions, querying and updating session states, and handling state change notifications.

classes.name: RialtoConnector
classes.description: Class responsible for managing Rialto server sessions and their states, including initializing the connection, creating sessions, and handling state changes.

methods.name: void initialize()
methods.description: Initializes the Rialto connector, setting up configuration and server management service.

methods.name: bool createAppSession(const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Creates a new application session with specified callsign, display name, and app ID.

methods.name: bool resumeSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Resumes a session identified by callsign if it is inactive.

methods.name: bool suspendSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Suspends a session identified by callsign if it is active.

methods.name: const RialtoServerStates getCurrentAppState(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Returns the current state of the application session identified by callsign.

methods.name: bool deactivateSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Deactivates the session associated with the callsign, changing its state to NOT_RUNNING.

methods.name: void stateChanged(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state)
methods.description: Handles an external change in application state, updating internal state maps and notifying waiting threads.

methods.name: bool waitForStateChange(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state,int timeoutMillis)
methods.description: Blocks until the application's state reaches the desired state or timeout occurs.

ctags.name: createAppSession
ctags.signature: (const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)

ctags.name: waitForStateChange
ctags.pattern: /^    bool RialtoConnector::waitForStateChange(const std::string& appId, const RialtoServerStates&/
